name: Pop Art - Color Music
description:
Want to show your artist talent but the old way is too boring? Join us in Pop Art - Color Music, a great combination of Art and Music, guess how cool it is!
The first time ever you can enjoy coloring with music. Only in Pop Art - Color Music. Coloring your favorite pictures with pop art style and feeling the beat of thousands of top songs. Coloring has never been so easy and fun. A huge collection of art for your choice. The most loved songs are added to give you the greatest experience with a coloring game that you've ever dreamt of.

How to play: Just tap and hold the round dots on the screen. Think that it’s easy? You wish. The more you cross the levels, the harder the game will be. Color your masterpieces with Pop Art - Color Music now!

Privacy Policy: https://amanotes.com/privacy-policy/
